description:
***** Please be sure to enroll in BECU Mobile Banking prior to logging in. To enroll, simply visit the ‘My Profile’ tab within BECU Online Banking and click on ‘Manage Mobile Banking.’ *****

Manage your finances on the go with BECU Mobile Banking. You can perform financial transactions with BECU anywhere, right from your mobile device.
 
What you can do using the BECU Mobile Banking App
- Pending debit card transactions
- Deposit checks by taking a picture with your mobile device
- Pay bills
- Make BECU loan and credit card payments
- Make real-time transfers between BECU accounts
- Check your account balances 
- View transaction history
- Search BECU locations, surcharge-free ATMs and partner credit unions
 
With BECU Mobile Banking you can conduct your financial transactions with the same confidence, security and convenience you expect when using BECU Online Banking. None of your personal BECU account information will be stored on your mobile device.
releaseNotes:
- Fixed bugs associated with mobile bill pay
- Fixed bugs associated with iOS6 users
- Updated Apple Store Icon for iOS7 capability
